name: Real Moskva City Car Driver 2
description:
Real Moskva City Car Driver 2 is a open world car driving game. Complete the missions, feel free to drive around and explore the city. But be careful about cops on your tail!
Features:
Simple and intuitive control
Steering: touch button control, or tilt
Realistic graphics
Realistic and accurate physics
Cool cars
Traffic system
Customization and settings
Individual camera angles
Easy to play
